ygData.subject: Re: Operation Black Tower
ygData.msgSnippet: Straight Shot was always ready for a good fight, and right now was no different than what she was already used to. Ready when you are Kup.  Just tell me what

Straight Shot was always ready for a good fight, and right now was no diffe=
rent than what she was already used to.

"Ready when you are Kup.  Just tel=
l me what kind of ammo you preffer and I'll calibrate my arrow system accor=
ding to your intel... But, if ya ask me, I think EMP rounds would suit us b=
est.  Confuse the living sparks outa those plane brains.  Primus knows they=
 deserve it."

Night Shift looks to Talon and then looks back toward Tucson=
.  Tucson suddenly senses his friend not too far, as he turns his head to d=
irect an ear in his direction.

" I know what you're thinking Night Shift. =
 But, if you put equal distance between the two of us, you can cover two co=
mrades at the same time."

Night Shift nodds.

"Oh yeah, duh, I should know=
 that.  You're right.  I cover you, and Talon at the same time.  Rely on Ra=
dar..  And so far, my radar's got more than just a couple of bogies on scre=
en."

Tucson catches the same threat via his sonar systems.

" So, this is =
how Hydras wishes to play..  I have a feeling that unless we lure him out o=
f his fortress, he will use that as an excuse to shield himself from impend=
ing danger and walk out of this unscathed.  Just like him to do that.  Kup,=
 I need you to do something for me.  I need you to really stir things up en=
ough so that Hydras is forced out of hiding, along with Cyclonus.  We get t=
hem away from the fortress and we've got a better chance at defeating them.=
  It'll be like getting a hermit crab out of its shell."

Meanwhile at the =
fortress, Rat Trap nodds as Windlord implements one of his transmetal feath=
ers in hopes to open up the hole in the wall.  He provides his comrade with=
 enough light to see what they're doing.

"There, just enough light ta see =
what we're don' but not enough ta draw attention."  I just hope Wheels can =
cook up a plan ta divert those uglies outa here so we can get in without in=
cident."

Back at the Ark, Quickstride finds himself overwhealmed with dark=
ness, yet with his stubborn mantality, he refuses to give into his surround=
ings.  He keeps the same stubborn look on his face, as he always did, like =
a mule refusing to move from his position.

" Rodimus, if you can hear me, =
I'd definitely bump up security in the Ark.. Something or someone is here, =
and they're not friendly.  And as soon as whoever or whatever it is, shows =
themselves, I'll be sure ta send them back ta the scrap heap they came from=
!"

He snorts with his statement.

"That's right, whoever or whatever ya ar=
e, why don't ya show a little back bone'n face me like a real bot!"

 You're right about the shots, we wouldn't want to do that...  But

>
